data.name: confBlockUser
data.value: Blocked users cannot send you contact requests and you will never be matched with them at the Language Roulette (if you want to unblock them later you can do it from your Account Settings). ¿Are you sure you want to block this user?

data.name: confirmSave
data.value: Do you want to save your changes before closing?

data.name: ConfirnGetLocation
data.value: Acording to your country's laws, we need to know your real location in order to store your billing address. If you click OK your navigator will ask for your location again.

data.name: ConnectionError
data.value: A connection error has ocurred during the call. The call will be finished

data.name: CRNoTopicsProposed

data.name: FeedbackSuccess

data.name: NetworkErrorInVideo
data.value: Connection to the Langademy servers has been lost. Try to call again after the connection is restored.

data.name: NoCameraNorMic
data.value: We couldn't detect a webcam or a microphone in your partner's device, your call will be finished

data.name: NoMediaAcceptance
data.value: Your partner couldn't connect the camera or the microphone and the call has been finished

data.name: NoOwnCameraNorMic
data.value: We couldn't detect a webcam or a microphone in your device, your call will be finished

data.name: NoOwnMediaAcceptance
data.value: You didn't grant access to your camera/microphone in your navigator. You can grant access to them and continue the call or leave the call now.

data.name: NoSupported
data.value: Your browser does not support this page

data.name: NoWebrtc
data.value: Your browser does not support video calls

data.value: You can call {0} when you're both online

data.value: {0} and you are online. You can start a videocall whenever you want

data.name: PrMeetupOver
data.value: The conversation duration that you scheduled has been exceeded. Add {0} to your contact list for speaking at any time

data.name: ProfileTripStep1
data.value: Add the languages you know and the languages you want to learn. You can only enter the rooms of the languages you have in your profile.

data.name: ProfileTripStep2
data.value: You can always go back to the home page by clicking the home button

data.name: rejectreqMB
data.value: Are you sure you want to reject this conversation request?

data.name: RoomTripStep1
data.value: Click the menu button to see its options

data.name: RoomTripStep2
data.value: Click on a connected user to make a videocall, check his profile or to send a connection request

data.name: RoomTripStep3
data.value: You will be able to make private video calls and chats without entering the rooms

data.name: RoomTripStep4
data.value: Check the next meetups of this room!,

data.name: RoomTripStep5
data.value: If the room is empty, create meetups at the time and day you want and try to gather your contacts there

data.name: RouletteCannotConnect
data.value: We couldn't connect you with your partner due to the security level of your networks

data.name: Trip2Step1
data.value: Enter the chat rooms if you want to chat or make calls with native speakers. You can use your Wallet and/or time banking accounts to make video calls

data.name: Trip3Step1
data.value: Find users that suit your preferences. Click the Search button and start contacting them!

data.name: TurnSecureServer
data.value: You probably are on a secure entrerprise network. Try to connect from another network

data.name: GeoNoAvailable
data.value: We are so sorry, but your browser cannot share your geolocation with Langademy, so you are not allowed to update your invoicing data. We recommend you to use Google Chrome for the best experience at Langademy

data.name: GeoNoPermission
data.value: We have detected that you denied the permission to share your geolocation with Langademy. Before you update your invoicing data, you must allow to share it (Your geolocation will remain private and it will not be published anywhere)
